critter.name: Surgeonfish
critter.desc: These tropical fish sport beautiful, yellow, triangular tails and elegant black lines on dazzling blue bodies. Personalitywise, the surgeonfish is actually rather laid back and timid. They seek out gaps in coral or between rocks for the greatest amount of protection while sleeping.
critter.quote: I caught a surgeonfish! Scalpel! Forceps! Fish hook!
